GeneralInfo.roadOrStreet: Near ST Thomas High School,SN Dubey Road

employerCategory.doc: CGOV - Centeral Goverment , SGOV - State Goverement  , PSU - Public Sector Unit, PE - Pensioners, OTH- Others, NA- Not Applicable

depositedAmtAggAmtExcd1CrPrYr.doc: Deposited amount or aggregate of amounts exceeding Rs. 1 Crore in one or more current account during the previous year

incurredExpAggAmt2LkTrvFrgnCountry.doc: Have you incurred expenditure of an amount or aggregate of amount exceeding Rs. 2 lakhs for travel to a foreign country for yourself or for any other person?

incrExpAggAmt1LkElctrctyPrYr.doc: Have you incurred expenditure of amount or aggregate of amount exceeding Rs. 1 lakh on consumption of electricity during the previous year?

basicsalary.doc: The basic salary defined in the form 16. This detail can be fetched from form 16BB

perquisitesValue.doc: Value of perquisites as per section 17(2)

profitsInSalary.doc: Profits in lieu of salary  as per section 17(3)

allwncExemptUs10.doc: Remuneration received as an official, by whatever name called, of an embassy, high commission etc
Allowances or perquisites paid or allowed as such outside India by the Government to a citizen of India for rendering service outside India
Retrenchment Compensation received in respect of schemes not approved
Retrenchment Compensation received in respect of approved scheme
Amount received/receivable on voluntary retirement or termination of service
Tax paid by employer on non-monetary perquisite
Allowance to meet expenditure incurred on house rent

Prescribed Allowances or benefits (not in a nature of perquisite) specifically granted to meet expenses wholly, necessarily and exclusively and to the extent actually incurred, in performance of duties of office or employment
Prescribed Allowances or benefits granted to meet personal expenses in performance of duties of office or employment or to compensate him for increased cost of living

houseproperty.doc: The type of the house property. It can have these  values S - selfoccupied or L- letout or D- Deemed Let out

S.doc: The arrears rent added here will be the total arrersRent received,the system will auto calculate the 30% of the same

section80C.doc: 80C - Life insurance premia, deferred annuity, contributions to provident fund etc.

section80CCD.doc: 80CCD(1) - Contribution to pension scheme of Central Government

section80CCD1B.doc: 80CCD(1B) - Contribution to pension scheme of Central Government

section80CCD2.doc: 80CCD(2) - Contribution to pension scheme of Central Government by employer

selfAndFamilyExcludingParentAsSeniorCtz.doc: whether you or your family member (excluding parent) is senior citizen. seniorCitizenFlag value should be 1- if yes  , 2. if No  , 3. Not Claiming for Self/Famiy

parentAsSeniorCitizen.doc: whether any one of your parent is senior citizen. seniorCitizenFlag value should be 1- if yes  , 2 - if No  , 4- Not Claiming for parents

section80DD.doc: Enter type 1-Dependent person with Disability,2-Dependent person with Severe disability

section80DDB.doc: Enter type 1-Self or dependent , 2-Self or Dependent - Senior Citizen

section80E.doc: 80E - Interest on loan taken for higher education

section80EE.doc: 80EE - Interest on loan taken for residential house property

section80EEA.doc: 80EEA - Deduction in respect of interest on loan taken for certain house property

section80EEB.doc: 80EEB - Deduction in respect of purchase of electric vehicle

section80U.doc: A person with disability, the type value should be either 1 when Self with Disability or 2 when Self with Severe disability
